column5: ~~~Any one no of where there is a Boat ramp spot for this lake. never phished it before, and it's where the dart landed, so that where were going
No idea, but this might help?  http://www.crystallakemarina.ca/
Thanks bud, may have to re-tossed the dart and find a lake closer, was looken at 3 hour drive from Ajax
The marina is on the Galway rd 10 in 10 out but a very good launch. Thiers another on Crystal Lake rd on Southside by dam. On a downhill and a corner parking for about 5 and dicey at best. Fun Lake.

The marina is on the Galway rd 10 in 10 out but a very good launch. Thiers another on Crystal Lake rd on Southside by dam. On a downhill and a corner parking for about 5 and dicey at best. Fun Lake. Very very busy lake, lived on the lake for many years. Fishing is slow and the boat traffic is just crazy now. Put it this way, the last time I went there, I had a guy on a sea doo do circles around me in the middle of the lake in a canoe. If I got a hold of him it wouldn't have been pretty, too bad I didn't call in for that one.  If you are driving 3 hours from Ajax, I urge you to look maybe in huntsville/haliburton direction where the fishing will be much better.
~~~~Thanks guys for the info, most likely we'll his Dalrimple
Dalrymple another fun lake. Be very careful the channel between the lakes idle only many many rocks.
